attributes.action: encourage the BBC not to scrap StoryFix
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For a long time this nation has been served by StoryFix, the best thing on the Red Button. Now the BBC are scrapping it, this weekend is the last every episode. Please encourage our government to step in and save this national institution.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
